Title: Vortex
Actors: Giedrius Kiela, Egle Mikulionyte, Oksana Borbat, Yevgeniya Varenitsa
Plot: The story of the generation who lived through the entire Soviet period is told through the main character: his childhood spent in a village, true friendship, work in Soviet Klaipeda, thrilling eroticism, and a final, fatal love.
